summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness in the sum of Three Thousand and No/100 ($3,000.00) Dollars, against the General Fund of the City of Seattle on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of Thirty-seventh Avenue from the North line of East Marion Street to a point Ninety-six (96) feet North to East Spring Street, by constructing a Pile Bridge, etc, as authorized by Resolution No. 3016.
